data.title: Peter Higgs
data.meta_description: Peter Higgs is a British theoretical physicist and Nobel Prize laureate “for the theoretical discovery of a mechanism that contributes to our understanding of the origin of mass of subatomic particles”. CERN announced on 4 July 2012 that they had experimentally established the existence the Higgs boson.
data.text: Peter Higgs is a British theoretical physicist and Nobel Prize laureate “for the theoretical discovery of a mechanism that contributes to our understanding of the origin of mass of subatomic particles”. CERN announced on 4 July 2012 that they had experimentally established the existence the Higgs boson.
